titles.title: A bill to establish pilot projects under the Medicare program to provide incentives for home health agencies to utilize home monitoring and communications technologies.
Fostering Independence Through Technology Act of 2007
Fostering Independence Through Technology Act of 2007

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Fostering Independence Through Technology Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of Health and Human Services to conduct pilot projects under title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act for the purpose of providing incentives to home health agencies to utilize home monitoring and communications technology.
